2002270.name: Story Time
2002270.description:
Tactical Combat with Wild Possibilities

Step into a world of myths and legends where strategy has no limits. With 45 unique characters, the synergies are endless—experiment to discover game-changing strategies that suit your playstyle:

  • Chain Explosions: Combine Goblin bombs with Elf archer precision.

  • Build a Feral Army: Turn enemies into werewolves to overwhelm the board.

  • Seduce & Conquer: Use Prince Charming to flip enemy loyalties to your side.

  • Strategic Defense: Protect your units with Dwarven walls while Scientists advance your technology.

  • Magic Combos: Transform foes into chickens with Witches, then send in Ninjas to finish them off.

Pure Strategy: No RNG, No Menus

We’ve removed the "luck" and the "clutter" so you can focus on the win.

  • No Missed Chances: Attacks always land—no plans are ever ruined by frustrating hit percentages.

  • Instant Action: Streamlined gameplay means no scrolling through tedious menus.

  • Fast-Paced Flow: Experience a tactics game that respects your time and rewards your creativity.

Build Your Own Stories

Use the Story Maker to create Fire Emblem-style levels and custom scenarios. Bring your ideas to life and share stories featuring characters from around the globe:

  • Save a princess from a dragon.

  • Guide units to enlightenment with Buddha.

  • Follow Harriet Tubman on the Underground Railroad.

Easy to Learn, Deep to Master

Every character features intuitive abilities—like Hercules hurling enemies or Treants spawning forests. Find the perfect synergy between these abilities to unleash devastating strategies on the battlefield.

Play Today

  • Competitive PvP: Battle friends worldwide in online multiplayer.

  • Local Mayhem: Get together and play on the couch with shared/split-screen support.

  • Try the Demo: Experience 15 characters, 15 story missions, and the Story Maker for free.

  • Enjoy the Full Game: With 45 characters the game is full of possibilities. Play today!
